text: [Music]
hello I'm Nikhil a cloud support
associate here at the a SS office in
Bangalore India
sometimes customers ask me how they can
repair their a SS patch compute
environments that goes into an invalid
state they also ask me how to fix these
a double dispatch computer environments
flip them back to a valid state and then
terminate these environments today I'll
show you how to accomplish these tasks
let's get started after logging into the
alias management console navigate to the
a SS batch console
in the navigation pane choose compute
environments I can see here that my
computer environments are an invalid
status let's check this one first
now I'll check the error code or message
that explains why my environment has
become invalid
the error message confirms that the
issue is caused by an incorrect service
role
I'll close the description box then for
this compute environment I'll verify
that it is an enabled state if it is
disabled I'll choose the enable button
and enable it
now I'll choose edit and under service
role I'll select the already existing
service role for batch that has all the
required permissions I'll click on save
and then reload the page
I can see that my environment has become
valid again after getting on to the
batch console click on compute
environments on the left pane
let's check the other environment I'll
check the error code of message why my
environment has become invalid
the error message indicates that an easy
to spot free troll needs to be created
so let's create one go to the AWS
management console and navigate to the
iam console here in the navigation pane
choose roles create role
then choose ec2 as the service to use
the roll scroll down after choosing easy
to then choose the last option easy to
spot free troll and not easy to spot
fleet this is a critical step and this
is where customers usually end up
choosing the incorrect option
next permissions makes tags next choose
review wheel and at the page to specify
the roll name for roll name enter Amazon
ec2 spot fleet roll
create roll
now we can return to the batch console
once we are back to the batch console
select compute environments on the Left
pane new compute environment should be
created with this new spot fleet roll
existing compute environments cannot
change spot rituals at this time spot
fleet instances should then be able to
provision successfully but we do need to
terminate this obsolete environment
click on the environment disable it
after disabling we can select the
compute environment again and delete it
it is deleted
we return to the a double spatch console
and again we click on compute
environments on the left pane we select
the third compute environment and we'll
check the error code our message why my
environment has become invalid the error
occurs when launched template associated
with the compute environment doesn't
exist unfortunately because the launch
template is gone there is no way we can
use the same compute environment again
we'll have to create a new one but we
still must delete this obsolete
environment
the fix is quite simple we choose the
environment check if it is enabled or
disabled if it is enabled we click on
the disable button in my case it is
already disabled here choose delete
now the environment is deleted thanks
for watching and happy cloud computing
from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
